org.asoem.greyfish.core.space

Interface Space2D<T,P extends org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Object2D>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Space<T,P>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicTiled2DSpace, TiledSpace<O,P,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBasicTiled2DSpace, ForwardingSpace2D, ForwardingTiledSpace, WalledPointSpace

    public interface Space2D<T,P extends org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Object2D>
extends Space<T,P>

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        boolean contains(double x,
                 double y)
        Tests if the point given by the coordinates x and y lies inside this space
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the point
        y - the y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true, if th point is within the boundaries of this space, false otherwise

      • moveObject

        void moveObject(T object2d,
                org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Motion2D motion2D)
        Move given object using it's motion
        Parameters:
        object2d - the object to move
        motion2D - the motion defining the move
        See Also:
        Moving.getMotion()

      • findObjects

        java.lang.Iterable<T> findObjects(double x,
                                  double y,
                                  double radius)
        Find all objects in this space with are contained in the circle defined by the center point at x, y and the radius
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the center point
        y - the y coordinate of the center point
        radius - the radius of the circle

      • getVisibleNeighbours

        java.lang.Iterable<T> getVisibleNeighbours(T object,
                                           double radius)
        Find all neighbours which are located inside the circle around object with given radius and are visible by the given object. Visibility is implementation dependent.
        Parameters:
        object - the object which acts as the center point for the search
        radius - the radius around the given object
        Returns:
        all objects which are visible by the given object at a distance less than or equal to the given radius

        double width()

      • height

        double height()

      • distance

        double distance(T agent,
                double degrees)
